long_desc.thetext:
[Version should be Rev 16 but that option doesn't exist yet.]
-----
There are two sections labelled 8.5.2: 8.5.2 [[SetInheritance]] (V) 8.5.2 [[IsExtensible]] ( )
-----
The following level-4 section headers are odd because the implied level-3 parent does not exist. (For example, section 12.1.1.1 is a subsection of 12.1 "Block"; there is no section 12.1.1.)
12.1.1.1 12.1.1.2 12.3.1.1 12.4.1.1 12.5.1.1 12.7.1.1 12.7.1.2 12.8.1.1 12.8.1.2 12.9.1.1 12.10.1.1 12.11.1.1 12.11.1.2 12.12.1.1 12.12.1.2 12.14.1.1 12.14.1.2 13.1.1.1 13.1.1.2 13.2.1.1 13.2.1.2 13.3.1.1 13.3.1.2 13.4.1.1 13.4.1.2 13.5.1.1 13.5.1.2
-----
Section 15.7.2 "Properties of the Number Constructor" contains subsections labelled: 15.7.3.7 15.7.3.8 15.7.3.9 15.7.3.10 15.7.3.11 15.7.3.12 15.7.3.13 15.7.3.14 In each case, change the "3" to a "2".
(Also, 15.7.2.7 will need to be renumbered or moved.)
-----
Section 15.7.3 "Properties of the Number Prototype Object" contains a subsection labelled: 15.7.4.8 Number.prototype.clz () Change the "4" to "3".
-----
Annex E contains two sections: 16.2 In the 6th Edition 16.3 In the 5th Edition These should presuably be labelled "E.1" and "E.2" (if anything).
-----
